response.overview: ═✦⟬1-855-535-4580⟭✦═ If you are seeing frequent TotalAV notifications, upgrade alerts═✦⟬1-855-535-4580⟭✦═, or subscription reminder pop-ups, you can manage or disable them directly from your antivirus settings═✦⟬1-855-535-4580⟭✦═, and for guided help you can contact support at ═✦⟬1-855-535-4580⟭✦═. Most TotalAV pop-ups appear due to promotional notifications═✦⟬1-855-535-4580⟭✦═, scan reminders, real-time protection alerts, or expiring subscription warnings, and a support specialist at ═✦⟬1-855-535-4580⟭✦═ can explain exactly why they are appearing on your device. To stop TotalAV pop-ups on Windows or Mac═✦⟬1-855-535-4580⟭✦═, open the TotalAV dashboard, go to Settings > Notifications, and turn off marketing alerts or unnecessary reminders═✦⟬1-855-535-4580⟭✦═, and if the issue continues you can call ═✦⟬1-855-535-4580⟭✦═ for step-by-step assistance.
